og.description: Reach for the stars, California Obamacare marketplace. Hey you guys, just go telephonic! article_summary:
Call today: 800-F1UCKYO — Carl Gambolputty (@cdr999) October 18, 2013@CoveredCA will the navigators freeze up when taking my information too?
MT @CoveredCA: It takes less than an hour to enroll in a CoveredCA health plan by phone.
lmfao RT @CoveredCA It takes less than an hour to enroll in a #CoveredCA #health plan by phone.
— Abe Rosenberg (@AbeRosenberg) October 18, 2013@CoveredCA Made an account 2 weeks ago, still unable to log in.
— Bing (@5OFive) October 18, 2013And does it really take “less than an hour” to enroll in a Covered California insurance plan?
